sprint_goal: Establish the foundational responsive UI, core scientific calculator engine, and the first advanced electronics mode (Ohm's Law).
Implement the complete user authentication lifecycle (Register/Login) and enable basic offline functionality for the core calculator.
Begin the user-extensible functionality by implementing the custom mode creation wizard and provide the user account deletion feature.
Deliver the core value of custom modes by enabling secure execution and implement the complex offline data synchronization mechanism. (This sprint is overloaded and should be split).
